text: (nabiyē!) mema pratikṣēpa karannan (apagē dutayā vana obava genahæra dakvamin) “mohu kerehi mohugē deviyan vetin (api kæmati ākārayaṭa) kumak hō sādhakayak pahaḷa kaḷa yutu novēda?”yi pavasannāha. (eyaṭa) oba mesē pavasanu: “niyata vaśayenma allāh (dan̆ḍuvam kirīmaṭa) adahas karana ayava, væradi mārgayehi athæra damannēya. sampurṇayenma ohu desaṭama siṭinnanva ṛju mārgayehi ætuḷu karannēya”
